markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 2,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Carved of driftwood stained white with the salt of the sea, a _pirate staff_ has jewels and gold pieces embedded in the wood. A skull and crossbones sit on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [fearsome](/Equipment.aspx?ID=731) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52).
  • **Cantrip** [_gale blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=917), [_know direction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)
  • **1st** [_seashell of stolen sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=993)
  • **2nd** [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [_water breathing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=370), [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371)
  • **3rd** [_mind of menace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=949), _water breathing_
  • **4th** [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290), _water walk_
  • **5th** [_flowing strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=914), [_mariner's curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=184)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Pirate Staff
